page.title: 16DITTON PRIORS ANIMAL SERVICE
page.content: {Mr Conway's}job is the local{Animal} {Lecture Service,}he visits schools all over the country giving lectures and showing the{Animals }.{Mr Conway}has been dealing with{Animals}for 10 years.He enjoys working with them very much.He used to have 100 different{ {Animals}now he's got about 30.His favourite{Animals}are the birds of prey.He keeps Amphibians ,Reptiles , Birds and Mammals. In a year he travels 40,000 miles approximely.He visits 400 different schools all over the country.He starts to train the{Animals}at an early stage and they carry on working for the rest of their lives. The oldest{Animal}is the Python he is a staggering 16 years old.He keeps{ {Animals}from all over the world Toads, Frogs,Lizards,Snakes,Kestrels,Owls, Foxs,Polecats,Chinchilas,Turaco's etc.
